entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:16 AM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023
